definitions.title: m.
definitions.body: ] bare, naked place (hence Maraqw/n, Marathon, acc. to Lewy: Fremdw. 144);—

bare place, or space: cstr. [[מִמַּעֲרִה־גָּ֑בַע]] Ju Jdg 20:33 bare  (open) space of Geba’ (si vera 1.; but v. II. [[מַעֲרָב]]); [[כְּמַעַר־אִישׁ]] 1Ki 7:36 according to the clear space on each (plate, v. [[לוּחַ]]).
sf. [[מַעְרֵח]] Na 3:5 fig. of Nineveh (pudenda exposed in shameful punishment; cf. [[עֶרְוָה]]).
